experience.description:
Azure Linux (Azure Compute)
As part of this team:
1. We own the entire Red Hat Enterprise Linux Image building and Update Infrastructure for Azure.
We publish the Red Hat Core VM images to Azure Marketplace. We also own the Red Hat Update
Infrastructure (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/workloads/redhat/redhat-rhui)
for Azure which is the CDN for all RHEL PAYG VMs on Azure.
2. We are developing the Compute Resource Provider for onboarding the RHEL customers to Azure
with minimal effort.
3. Also we contribute to Open Source Software and endorse OSS. We have successfully delivered
new Resource Provider named Workload Builder as part of Azure Migrate to migrate and onboard
Linux Workloads like JBOSS (reached private preview), Moodle (Lamp stack) to Azure. It has been
showcased in the last Microsoft Ignite.
4. We also co-own the services for Azure Hybrid Benefit for RHEL enabling PAYG to BYOL switch for
existing customers and this capability has reached GA

member.occupation: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft R&D India Pvt. Ltd

projects.description:
#Hackathon2018
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A Visual Studio Extension which integrates with Visual Studio Online and helps developers to intelligently suggest existing Code Snippets. As a developer starts writing code, it parses the word and pops up an Action Bulb which when pressed, queries the back-end API service for getting the relevant wrappers, packages, projects where the related code snippets are available with Gamified features to help individual to take better decisions on which one to use. 
Following are the essential benefits:
1. We can write code in less time.
2. Re usability with broader choice
3. Tagging the VSTS projects with relevant tags.
4. Focus on Logic rather than on implementation
5. RUSE suggests quality code, which will enable developers to improve coding standards.

Techniques/Concepts Used:
1. Machine Learning
2. Inbuilt Metrics
3. NLP
projects.title: RUSE

member.occupation: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft R&D India Pvt. Ltd

projects.description:
An Enterprise comprises of a huge infrastructure with thousands of servers or more. My projects aims Virtual Machines hosted in cloud. Though the present solution is associated with Azure cloud infrastructure, but the same can be extended to other cloud offerings in future.
Every resource consumption incurs cost in the cloud. In similar fashion, enterprise applications which handle critical transactions, which directly impacts the revenue of the organization are hosted in the Azure VM's (IAAS) and is explicitly managed by the Service Engineers to ensure Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery. But there are time frames when certain sets of VMs remain idle but still incur cost due to CPU cycles. So this project aims to analyze the time series of the VMs and to intelligently snooze them when not in use. This saves $$$ and also adds to cost reduction which in turn enables an enterprise to save a millions of dollars and also enable then to work smartly. Even this automation eliminates manual toil and saves time.
Personally, I have mentored an intern to develop the prototype.
projects.title: Intelligent Azure VM Snoozing

projects.description:
Powered by Power BI.
With great tool comes great productivity. Power BI is such a great innovation which helped me to gather huge amount of data from various sources and develop real-time dashboards which empowered the leadership to visualize the Business, Application and Infrastructure Insights. The data can be sliced and diced as well as presented with varied filters which helps to visualize the relevant data yearned by an individual.
Following are some useful dashboards helped leaderships to judge the business impacts:
1. Infrastructure and Platform Compliance

    1.2. Infrastructure As Service Adoption 
    1.3. Infrastructure Utilization Trends
    1.4. Infrastructure Downsize Recommendation for Cost optimization

and more.

2. Service Quality/Metrics

    2.2. Incident/Ticket Metrics
    2.3. Reliability

3. Live Site Incidence TTx Metrix

Overall, Power BI is always in my recommendation list.

member.occupation: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft R&D India Pvt. Ltd

projects.description:
A robust and generic workflow engine - A workflow template is made standard for defining the workflow. The JSON template is used as input to the engine. The engine parses the file to understand the way the DR activities need to take place and triggers the activities sequentially as defined by User. The automated features include :
1. Checking the Health of Target Node.
2. Cluster Resources
3. Intelligent Rollback Mechanisms
4. Pre and Post Failover Checks
projects.title: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery System

member.occupation: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft R&D India Pvt. Ltd

projects.description: Azure Orphaned Resources are the resources like NSG, Public IP, VHDs, OS Image which were once associated with deleted VM's. Once VMs are deleted these associated resources stagnate the space and incurs $$. The automation module takes care of managing this resources as well as intelligently delete the unnecessary resources which populates the Azure subscriptions. The module also ensures prevention of accidental deletion of resources as well as supports simulation of the process which is a key feature to just estimate the actions taken by the tool.
projects.title: Management of Azure Orphaned Resources

member.occupation: Software Engineer 2 at Microsoft R&D India Pvt. Ltd

projects.description:
2.4.	Log Management Automation

Developed a group of scripts to automatically manage log file storage. The following functionalities are covered:
	Automated deployment of the scripts and scheduling the tasks based on customizable configuration file.
	The following tasks are scheduled in task scheduler:
Compressing the log files provided the files exceed the configured time in Configuration File.
Archive the compressed files, provided the files exceed the configured time in Configuration File.
Deletion of archived files provided the files exceed the configured time in Configuration File.
Generate the log of operations performed by the scheduled tasks.

CUSTOMER IMPACT: The Automated process will eliminate manual effort and in turn reduce tickets related to shortage of disk space in production servers due to generation of huge amount of log files. Efficient Management of historical logs.
projects.title: Log Management Automation
